Literature.Title: The effect of glycine replacement with flexible ω-amino acids on the antimicrobial and haemolytic activity of an amphipathic cyclic heptapeptide.
Literature.Author: Oddo A, Nyberg NT, Frimodt-Møller N, Thulstrup PW, Hansen PR

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>150 µM,Human erythrocytes:<8% Hemolysis=150 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>128µM),Candida albicans ATCC 200955(MIC=128µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=>128µM)
